title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Toulouse, France
description:
Global Day of CodeRetreat in Toulouse, France. 
The event will be hosted and sponsored by Lyra Network. 
It will be facilitated by Anthony Eden, Antoine Vernois, Damien Mathieu and Ludovic Pradel.
